title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Studies from Jamaica, West Indies.  A. Houses.  B. Trunk of a tree with parasitical plants.", May–August 1865
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457e, and 457d.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right: Jamaica
description: Horizontal view of a complex containing three buildings, probably houses, with a double flight of steps leading to a porch on the upper floor of the one at extreme right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Studies from Jamaica, West Indies.  A. Houses.  B. Trunk of a tree with parasitical plants.", May–August 1865.
May–August 1865. Graphite on olive colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-607-a.
